#### About me

I’m a researcher at the Center for the Study of Security and Drugs (CESED) at Universidad de los Andes.

My primary interests are Public Policy, Illegal Markets, and urban economics. I’m also interested in Applied Econometrics, Big Data, and Machine Learning.

You can find my CV [here](https://eduard-martinez.github.io/cv/CV-Eduard_F_Martinez_G.pdf) and my intermediate-level R course on GitHub [here](https://github.com/taller-R-202301).
